devdoc.author: Macccs Universal
devdoc.details: extension of Slot_machine contract.All function calls are currently implemented without side effects.Constructor inherits VRFConsumerBaseNetwork: KovanLINK token address: 0xa36085f69e2889c224210f603d836748e7dc0088Key Hash: 0x6c3699283bda56ad74f6b855546325b68d482e983852a7a82979cc4807b641f4Chainlink VRF Coordinator address: 0xdD3782915140c8f3b190B5D67eAc6dc5760C46E9Fee: 100000000000000000

claimReward(uint256,uint256).details: can only be called by registered players

params._counter: uint pointing to the index of the game where rewards can be claimed.
params._gameId: uint representing sending addresses gameId in games log.

deposit().details: depositsEnabled - whilst enableDeposits is true this function will remain active.if player is already registered only players balance with be increaed.

depositsCircuitBreaker().details: circuit breaker to disable the deposit function. Can only be accessed by contract owner.

destroy().details: restricted to contract owner.all funds deposited to contract will be returned to owner should this be called.plans to implement a countdown to give players time to withdraw funds before contract destruction.

getBalance().details: returns the current ETH balance of this contract.balance will be returned in Wei.

getLinkBalance().details: LINK is required to make random number requests.Contract must have a balance of at least 0.1 LINK

getLogs().details: loops through number of games played by address and stores each games variables in an array.can only be called by registered players.

returns._0: game Id, guess, winning number, bet, reward and if the rewards have been claimed.

getPlayerBalance().details: will only return balance of registered player.onlyPlayer restricts access to players only.uint will return balance in Wei.

getPlayerBets().details: will only return placedBets of registered player.onlyPlayer restricts access to players only.uint will return bets in Wei.

getResult().details: can only be called by registered players.

returns._0: game Id, guess, winning number, bet and reward of the current game.

placeBet(uint256).details: modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call this function.

params._amount: is the value amount to place a bet with.

playGame(uint32,uint256).details: Call startGame function after all checks and updates have been completed.

params._bettingAmount: is the amount player is betting on the result.

undoBet(uint256).details: modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call this function.

params._amount: is the value amount to remove from placedBets.

withdrawAll(address).details: Not sure we actually need the playerCount state variable or the struct variable playerId.modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call withdrawal methods.modifier withdrawalsEnabled - whilst enableWithdrawals is true this function will remain active.

params._to: is the EOA or Contract funds are to be withdrawn to.

withdrawBalance(address,uint256).details: Not sure we actually need the playerCount state variable or the struct variable playerId.modifier onlyPlayer allows only active players to call withdrawal methods.modifier withdrawalsEnabled - whilst enableWithdrawals is true this function will remain active.

params._to: is the EOA or Contract funds are to be withdrawn to.
params._withdrawalAmount: is the value amount to be withdrawn.

withdrawalCircuitBreaker().details: circuit breaker to disable the deposit function. Can only be accessed by contract owner.

devdoc.title: Guessing Game contract.

claimReward(uint256,uint256).notice: use this function to claim a reward.

deposit().notice: Use this to deposit some ETH to contract, register as a new player and increase your balance.

destroy().notice: destroys and removes contracts from blockchain.

getLinkBalance().notice: LINK token balance of this contract.

getLogs().notice: log of all games played by player.

playGame(uint32,uint256).notice: initiates the start of the game and makes all necessary checks before continuing.

undoBet(uint256).notice: Use this to dynamically undo placed bets.

withdrawAll(address).notice: Use this to withdraw all funds from the contract.

withdrawBalance(address,uint256).notice: Use this to withdraw balance from the contract that corresponds to the value or less than the players balance.

userdoc.notice: have a guess at the random number to be retuned, if you're right you win double the money you've bet on your guess.
